cards.name: Annihilus
cards.ability: On Reveal: Your cards with Power below 0 switch sides. Destroy those that can't.

cards.name: Bolts of Balthaak
cards.ability: Next turn, you get +4 Energy.

cards.name: Cap's Shield
cards.ability: Ongoing: This can't be destroyed. Give your Cap +2 Power when this moves to Cap's location.

cards.name: Cerebro
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your highest-Power cards have +2 Power.

cards.name: Clea
cards.ability: When this permanently gains Power, add a Flames Of The Faltine to your hand. (if in hand or in play)

cards.name: Dormammu
cards.ability: Game Start: Begin a Summoning Ritual. (Add step 1 to hand.)

cards.name: Electro
cards.ability: On Reveal: +1 max Energy. Ongoing: You can only play 1 card a turn.

cards.name: Esme Cuckoo
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy a card from your deck into your hand. Set its Cost to 3 and Power to 4.

cards.name: Flames of the Faltine
cards.ability: On Reveal: Afflict an enemy card here with -3 Power.

cards.name: Hazmat
cards.ability: On Reveal: Afflict all other cards with -1 Power.

cards.name: Hercules
cards.ability: The first time another one of your cards moves here each turn, move it to another location.

cards.name: Jennifer Kale
cards.ability: Activate: Next turn, you get +1 Energy.

cards.name: Kahhori
cards.ability: On Reveal: Each card in your hand gives one of your other cards in play +1 Power.

cards.name: Makkari
cards.ability: End of Turn: Runs from your hand to a random location. (if possible)

cards.name: Merlin
cards.ability: At the start of each turn, add an <mark>Incantation</mark> to your hand.

cards.name: Morgan le Fay
cards.ability: On Reveal: Return all your discarded and destroyed cards to hand with +3 Power.

cards.name: Nicholas Scratch
cards.ability: After you play a Skill, +1 Power.

cards.name: Nightmare
cards.ability: On Reveal: Replace the text of each card in your hand with text from a random card of the same Cost.

cards.name: Polymorph
cards.ability: On Reveal: Transform your lowest-Power card here into one that costs 1 more.

cards.name: Sauron
cards.ability: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards in your deck.

cards.name: Storm
cards.ability: On Reveal: Flood this location. Next turn is the last turn cards can be played here.

cards.name: Strange Supreme
cards.ability: Gains +2 Power from merging. End of Turn: Merge one of your created cards into this.

cards.name: Temporal Manipulation
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give Agamotto +3 Power. Put him into your hand if heâ€™s not in play.

cards.name: The Ancient One
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add <mark>Tao Mandala</mark> to your hand.

cards.name: Time Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give Thanos -1 Cost.

cards.name: Toxie Doxie
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give 2 characters in your hand +2 Power. You can't play them next turn.

cards.name: Winds of Watoomb
cards.ability: On Reveal: Afflict an enemy card here with -5 Power and move it right.

items.title: Golden Gauntlet II
items: The event will be open to the public and will have 1,200 players. Visit Discord for more info.

items.title: High Voltage Overdrive
items: The ultra fast game mode with three turns and tons of energy returns.
